titleStmt.title: A method and instructions for the art of divine meditation, with instances of the severall kindes of solemne meditation. / By Thomas White minister of Gods word in London.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, Presbyterian minister in London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Joseph Cranford at the signe of the Phœnix in St Pauls Church yard, near the Little North.Doot, [sic],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
